mapper.prompt:
Transcribe this message, only output transcription, nothing else. Avoid empty lines or special formatting, should be 1 block of text!!!!!

good output:
Hi there
(no empty line below)

Bad output:
Hi there
(empty line below)

mapper.prompt: Describe what is in the this image, if it is screenshot, make sure to write out all the details of the image. do NOT special formatting or empty lines in your output. 1 block of text please. do not use any symbols or quotation marks. this output will be put in a request body so make sure the output is clean for an api call. NEVER use "", this will give an error in our api key, also dont use dollar signs.

spec.name: imageUploadType
spec.label: How would you like to specify an image?

nested.help: Public URL of the image. For example, `https://getmyimage.com/myimage.png`.
nested.name: imageUrl
nested.label: Image URL

mappable.help: Public URL of the image. For example, `https://getmyimage.com/myimage.png`.

nested.help: Binary data of the image. For example, you can retrieve the binary data of your image using the __HTTP: Get a file__ module.
nested.name: imageFileData
nested.label: Image File

mapper.data: {"message":{"role":"user","content":"The user send an image, here is the description of the image, {{68.text}}"},"agent_id":"241e433f-c30f-4731-b51b-4acd2cc9a05c","conversation_id":"{{1.messages[].from}}"}
